tag_list: homes-denver, search-homes-mls, home-buyer, home-seller, denver, colorado
overview:
Michael is a Denver Colorado real estate broker associated with RE/MAX. His real estate company assists buyers and sellers with the marketing, sale, and purchase of homes, condominiums, town-homes and more, in all price ranges throughout the Denver Metropolitan Area.

Services involve no-cost ‘Buyer Representation’ for first-time home buyers to repeat buyers of all home types, including new homes, resale homes, contemporaries, bungalows, ranches, and acreage property.

Seller services involve expert home preparation, marketing, and sales, in all neighborhoods across the city.

Relocation services are also provided to individuals, families, and military personnel. A relocation concierge will assist both incoming and outgoing relocatees throughout the USA.
